name: Devon Callaway
text: Stopped by for some food since we were visiting the Gateway Mall. This was our first time eating at the restaurant. I ordered the five cheese with tomato and it was delicious. The  floor manager was very friendly and gave us a coupon for a free small plate for next time.

name: Kari Shepherd
text: Amazing food but not too pricey. First time I have dined here and I was so impressed. The service was fast and friendly, the restaurant was clean, and the food sealed the deal. The flat bread I got was so good. Never had grapes on a flat bread but man did it not disappoint.

name: Jenny Wong
text: Wasn‚Äôt expecting much as I tried other CPK before. Service was great they keep coming back ask me is my mint drink has enough mint as I requested more. Linguine was great with tender chicken breast. Overall good value for money and will recommend to come.

name: Travis Moulton
text:
This was my first time going to a California Pizza kitchen and I'm not sure why I haven't been going!
I got the mushroom sausage pepperoni pizza (without the mushrooms). ‚Ä¶More

name: Ricka Dagger
text: Somewhat busy at lunchtime but the wait was worth it. Especially the dessert.

name: lookat whatisee
text: High quality food, small plates, lots of money the best thing about our visit was the Host who answered our questions and our server Andy. Andy was well informed about veganism and took care of us like a professional.

name: Chirelle Pearson
text: Delicious!! Staff was awesome! Pizza was great! The guac with the chips wasn't enough, but good.

name: Loa Fa
text: The service at this gateway location has always been great! Today I placed an order before 9pm supposedly with a guy from their call center who did not pass my order to the restaurant. Upon arriving at this location to pick up, the store ‚Ä¶More

name: Flor Tapia
text:
I never got disappoint on the food
Is always very very good love BBQ chicken salad ...coliflower pizza ...caramel apple ice cream üòãüòã

name: Alicia Baker
text: Girls casual night out! We went to the yoga & beer class down the street first, then headed over to CPK. First we all ordered the same drink, the cucumber jalapeno cocktail. It was sooo good! I really want to try making this myself now. Its ‚Ä¶More

name: David Castillo
text: Unfortunately, I have nothing to say about the food. My parents invited my wife and kids out to eat before an event. My dad called ahead and asked if they take reservations. The person on the phone said they did and took his reservation. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Bunker
text: It's not bad, but the wait for a table was not really worth it. The wait for the food on top of that made it really not worth it. If you can order it to go ahead of time it might be okay because it was decent enough.

name: Sal Giani
text: Haven't been in forever and still pleased with the service, menu and especially the pizza crust!üçï

name: Erik Black
text: Great food and service

name: Sandy Clark
text: I waited to give a review so I didn't say something in anger. We came to the restaurant and it was busy. I have been a server and totally understand busy but our server managed to make us feel like we were invisible. We sat there for what ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeremy Skinner
text: Last weekend we went up to see movie "A Simple Favor" at the Gateway. While waiting for the movie to start, we walking around and found only a few places are open including California Pizza. We went in and shared a California Club pizza. Delicious and plus the service was great!

name: Raymond Hensley
text: The California club pizza was delicious as well as the chicken picatta. It comes with two breasts which was a pleasant surprise. Reasonably priced, $45 pre-tip with drinks.

name: Eric DeRieux
text: My wife and I went here for a quick dinner before a movie. The staff was friendly and attentive and the drinks and food tasted great. I was given the wrong order but the manager went above an beyond to make it right, I would eat here again.

name: D D
text: Cons: overpriced dinner service. $20 for a plate of pasta after tip? No thanks. Plus the interior looks like a renovated Denny's. Go to literally any other local place; you'll pay less and the food and atmosphere will be better. ‚Ä¶More

name: Capri Bailey
text: Fresh ingredients and tasty sauces ... Wha more would you want on a pizza? Spoiler alert, the crusts are closer to the recent flat bread craze than pizza ... It's all good!!!

name: Aaron Saxon
text: Great food, the staff got slammed just before an event at Vivint Smart Home Arena and was slightly overwhelmed all at once. They still managed to take it all in stride and kept their attitudes in check even though they were slightly shorthanded. Kudos to a decent recovery.

name: Greg Preston
text: I ordered the steak salad, when it came to the table, I asked waitress where are the tomatoes? She said "it doesn't come with tomatoes". Then I realized the bacon wasn't on it either!! They didn't offer me a new salad, half of my ‚Ä¶More

name: Tom Golson
text: Friendly staff, good service and a menu that's reliable and tasty. This is a good place to grab a bite where everyone can find something!

name: Alexis Jentry Pierce
text: Always love coming here! Clean and helpful staff! Very friendly too! Yummy food and accommodation to allergies! Clean facility!

name: Hailey LaMunyon
text: Really good food, and servers are very welcoming. Relatively fast sit down restaurant.

name: Elissa Glass
text: I just came in and had a wonderful experience! What made this experience so great is the people who work here, especially a guy named Tony. Thank you Tony for making my night! I will definitely come back.

name: Andy D
text: Had the Jerk Chicken Pizza...might be the best pizza I've ever had! Crust is crunchy on the edges, chewy under the topping. Bacon is phenomenal! Smoked and the perfect amount of chew. Sweet, spicey, salty...this hits on all cylinders!

name: Lauren K
text:
As told by a 2nd grader!
"California Pizza Kitchen Review (5 stars!). California Pizza Kitchen is the best place in Utah. California Pizza Kitchen has really good food. My favorite is ‚Ä¶More

name: Adam Green
text: The food was good, not great. However. The prices were very high. A roughly 12 inch pie, with very thin crust is at least $15, and up to 18ish if you want more than cheese and pepperoni. A $9 Mac and cheese meal included 4 tablespoon sized mac bites. Thats ridiculous.

name: Richard Bangerter
text: Great food and great service. I really enjoyed my lunch.

name: Eduardo Perez
text: The service was good. The Sangria's are delicious.

name: James Gardner
text: Pizza was okay not the best in SLC...but definitely not the worst. Service was fantastic. Butter cake with Haagen-Dazs ice cream? Yep. That is good stuff.

name: Ian Hoag
text: Pretty typical CPK.  One complaint though...  It was cold at our table.  Every time someone opened the inner door it got even colder because the outer door was propped open by a sign on a day when the temperature outside was in the 20's.

name: Preston Bailey
text: Best gluten free pizza, and like really gluten free (gig certified).

name: RGM
text: Friendly staff, food arrived very quickly and was delicious! Pizzas were very fluffy and tasty!

name: Becky Thomas
text: Needs vegan options! We came here with some friends and their food looked wonderful! They loved it but as vegans, my husband and I ordered off the vegetarian menu And omitted the cheese... What was left was a very dry pizza with lots of ‚Ä¶More

name: Greg Wright
text: Great pizza and fast service. We visited before dinner hour and it was just the right amount of time. Loved it. Will go back for sure.

name: Diogo Fonseca
text: Great service, great food. Stewart was awesome!

name: Adam Venord
text: MMMMM YES EXQUISITE FOOD, DELIGHTFUL ATMOSPHERE, AND BEST OF ALL FINE DRESSED WAITERS AND WAITRESSES. WOULD ATTEND AGAIN

name: MorganMarie
text: My favorite pizza is the California Club! We'll take the hour drive just go get it. However, customer service could improve. Our waiter was very charming and nice, but never came to refill drinks, check in on us, and took a long time getting us a check.

name: Connor Gallimore
text: Had a pleasant time. Joshua was our server and he did a great job. I had an issue downloading the App for the free small plate, but he was able to resolve the issue with little to no trouble! Excellent server to request if you want someone on the softer side.

name: Elias Pernia
text: This is our favorite pizza place on Salt Lake City.

name: Ben Marchant
text: The pizza was really good. I would definitely eat here again. üçï

name: Bandit 82
text: Good selection for those with different dietary needs. A little pricey though.

name: Racquel Augat
text: We were here at prime seating time on a Friday during a holiday season. It wasn't a bad wait. But, we chose to sit at a table in the bar area. They were super chaotic with the service. Seemed like they were short staffed. Took a bit to get ‚Ä¶More

name: Kayla Butcher
text: Food combos were unique, but also a little strange. It was clean, cool, and quiet. We had a peaceful great lunch.

name: Ali Hansen
text: Delicious food! It was a little bit crazy due to spring break, and they weren't ready for it, but the server had a good attitude, despite having 9 tables to serve. Definitely hope to eat there again sometime soon!

name: mary smith
text: We come to this location every time we go to Salt Lake. The food is consistently good and usually the service is as well. I would have given it five stars but the last time we ate there our server was obviously high and gave pretty mediocre ‚Ä¶More

name: Elizabeth Torralba
text: My favorite. Great soup, Ribeye and food!

name: Lynn Dahle
text: I got takeout and the order was ready when I got there. The staff was friendly and efficient. The staff helping me made sure I had my whole order and silverware to go with. Great experience

name: Ameya Gamre
text: Great pizzas! The staff was friendly and kept up with the various little requests we had.

name: Candice Cronin
text: Still such a great place to eat, all these years later! We experienced a pizza with cauliflower crust, WOW!! So tasty! Guilt free pizza experience! Nice staff, clean restaurant, prompt service!!

name: Agent Los
text: A little pricey but yummy.

name: Toby Sisneros
text: Service  was great it was veterans day got a nice tasty  pizza

name: Jared Willden
text: Pretty typical of CPK. Good pizza, good service

name: Andrew Sanford
text: It‚Äôs a nice venue, and their pizza is always good.

name: Jenney Wilder
text: Brady, the GM, & the team at CPK at the Gateway catered a private party at the Discovery Gateway Children's Museum for me.  They were on time. There was good food. Brady was extremely helpful with the planning process.

name: Anand Wuppuluri
text: Good restaurant in a great Location. The ambiance is good but can be ceowded based on time and day of the week. Our family loves this place. They got a wide selection of menu items with good service.

name: Sergio de Chazal
text: We had dinner and my son is a bit picky but he enjoyed the Mac and cheese...they we delicious! We had a really good experience here with Email and Brady. Ty hey we really welcoming, place very clean. And food amazing.

name: Kat White
text: Overpriced, their barback doesn't properly stock but the rest of the staff is great and the cooks are on point.

name: Melissa Moaremoff
text: Great atmosphere good food great staff

name: Jonathan Morris
text: Was transferred 3 times before ordering.  When I arrived to pick up the order, the eight or so employees there ignored me by for a good 5 minutes until I grabbed one walking by.  While ringing up I was told they ran out of what I ordered ‚Ä¶More

name: Kawaii Jello
text: Pretty expensive, Definitely a place for a special occasion, it looks beautiful there and the food is very good! I loved it

name: Kimberly Flounory

text: Great pizza great atmosphere very good place to eat

name: Stephen Throndsen
text: Amazing food, atmosphere and staff!

name: Eran Bair

name: snow cat
text: The manager Krista was awesome she was helping everybody and really made my time in their very pleasurable and I had a great experience Thank you Krista

name: Kevin Denos

name: christina maki

name: Tyler Lamming
text: Our server messed up our order, but fixed it with a free dessert. Some of the paint was peeling off the ceiling near the kitchen. Other than that, the atmosphere was nice!

name: Jared Bertrand
text: Didn't even have the chance to order. We sat down, were told about their app and free offers, then after waiting 25 minutes for the server to come take our order, we got up and left without anyone saying a word to us. Had the the establishment been busy, it would have been understandable. But they weren't.

name: Benjamin Bakaitis
text: Service is great, food better. Fun location that can easily be walked to

name: John Melloy
text: The pizza is sooo good especially with that truffle sauce. Yum!

name: Aaron Picker
text: Had dinner here last week. The food was tasty, as expected. And a little over priced, as expected. Our server got distracted at one point after agreeing to bring a drink refill. We waited for the drink. Then we were finished and waited for ‚Ä¶More

name: Jill Genovesi
text: Fast, good, but expensive. My shrimp zucchini fettuccini had no cream sauce,  but I suppose it was not supposed to.  That was really the icky let siren odd the entire meal.  Really great service.

name: David Arrington
text: Service was mediocre. 3/5 stars.

name: kleidy west
text: I really enjoyed the pizza,different flavor but i like it!

name: CLSH
text: Very friendly waiter. The food was just ok. The shrimp was chewy. The pizza was bland. It was nice and quiet, so we were able to enjoy our conversations.

name: Richard Savage
text: Went up to see movie review at the Gateway. A lot of the places are closed but California Pizza was open. While waiting for the movie to start we went in and shared a Hawaiian pizza. Delicious and the service was great. Would recommend anyone having a meal there before the movie.

name: Josephine Salazar
text: Our server Kevin did well serving our party of 8. Great effort, Service with a Smile!

name: Nicole Fraijo
text: They have really good pizza. Service was great as well

name: Aldo E. Garc√≠a Guerrero
text: Good service and the jambalaya was really good.

name: Paul Worlton
text: The food was good, if a bit spendy. They brought the wrong side (a salad) but later returned and tried to correct it (to soup). The salad itself was good but the dressing portion is meager. I'd recommend the pizza but I have no experience with other menu items.

name: Derek Wilkes
text: I have literally been put off by every location of this chain that I have visited (4 total). The customer service they offer is horrendous. The only reason I gave this one more star is because the bar tender I dealt with for 10 seconds was ‚Ä¶More

text: I've been to this location before and had good experiences, but my wife and I went weekend before last before going to a concert at The Depot... and had a terrible experience.  I will say up front that the food was good, particularly the ‚Ä¶More

name: Maggie Goertzen
text: The service was awesome- it was a very crowded night due to a concert over at the arena. The staff was efficient and friendly, provided great service in the face of everything. Food quality did not suffer either. the kitchen and staff seemed very well equipped to handle the insanity.

name: eranthe badillo
text: California Pizza Kitchen is great it's just the Utah drinking laws you have to know. Since this is a "restaurant" you cannot just go to the bar and order a drink you have to order food with it! I am new to the state so everytime I go there it's always something new I learn.

name: Jason Lovato
text: Tall Tracy was super wonderful waitress. Everything else there was unacceptable. The food was horrible. Spinach artichoke appetizer, horrible. Fettuccine, horrible Mexican corn, horrible. The only good thing was as we were seated fast but that must be because the food is horrible. No one's going to wait in line for this place.

name: Troy
text: Great food. New to this pizza joint and was very immpressed.

name: Dominique Madison
text: Long story short... I gave the guy a $6.00 tip (because he didn't have change)for a soggy avocado club roll, that was 15 minutes late. Not happy, but things happen and I get it. Then... I started eating my soggy avocado roll (I'm starving) and there is a tiny cockroach smashed on my lid. Yep. I'm done. No thanks.

name: Aubrey Jean
text: Large party and the waiter had a super attitude. Food was great maybe 2 waiters.to a large party

name: Dillon Chen
text: Great food, Awesome service!

name: Kelsey Tolbert
text: OVERPRICED. The quality and taste of the food is not at all worth the cost. I got the Santa Fe power bowl, which I could have easily made at home for a third of the price. It did not have much flavor and the lime chicken inside was an ‚Ä¶More

name: Krista Gustaveson
text: Sooooo yummy!! I went there with my 5 & 7 year old. It was kid friendly and sooo delicious!! The portion sizes were great!! My 7 year old always gets mac & cheese. At other places he ALWAYS leaves hungry, but here the portion size was ‚Ä¶More

name: CornerKofford
text: It's a bit pricey, but the service was good and to have a fire baked pizza was great. We ordered the Scilian which was delicious.

name: Mike Jones
text: A little pricey but the food was pretty good.

name: Jacob Wells
text: Super great staff and food. I love the light options and they have an amazing drink that a sparkling berry water. Super fancy and super good. The bathrooms were very nice and the location is good.

name: Ryan Wagoner
text: Really great service and quick for take out. Food is always great and always have a good time.

name: Rose Thomas
text: Let me tell you something ,I've never heard of hipster pizza place. But I'll be damned I have now been to a hipster pizza place. They Can put damn near whole salad on the pizza according to this place. But i tell you what is some mediocre ‚Ä¶More

name: Claire Larson
text: Good food and service

name: Harlie Lynn
text: Ordered Avocado egg rolls. The appetizer. Staff was super friendly and accommodating. They have coffee and gluten free options!

name: Ryan Smith
text: Our server appeared to be high, and never brought us our bread. We even reminded him, and he went to get it, but never returned. We just wanted our bread while we waited for our meal. 48 hours later, and I'm still thinking about that delicious looking bread that I never got to taste. üò•

name: Cory Waterford
text: Great food and great service from Savanah. It was super busy due to a Jazz game and we were still seated in u set 10 minutes and served quickly.

name: Carla Pitcher
text: They were super busy but we still received wonderful service. Amy is a great manager and they are lucky to have her at CPK. üëç

name: Kayla Hall
text: Clean, wonderful service, an array of new cuisines to try. One star docked for kids meal prices.

name: Kerry Moore
text: Located in the Gateway Mall. One of the few remaining eating establishments. Great food and great specials. Variety of pizzas are tasty. Pasta dishes, salads and more.  Great service. Near Vivint Center.  Also close to homeless shelter, ‚Ä¶More

name: Jody Bailey
text: There was a homeless man who came in. While directing him to a place that could help him, they treated him with the utmost kindness and respect. KUDDOS CPK!!!

name: Jean Allen
text: The kids macaroni and cheese is great, the kids desserts are well priced, The pizza is absolutely awful which doesn‚Äôt bode well considering they‚Äôre called the ‚ÄúCalifornia pizza kitchen‚Äù

name: Jackson Robinson
text: Long wait times, only a few good pizza options.

name: Sharon McBride
text: Good customer service.  Food par.

name: Carey J
text: Nice place to eat! Good service! Great food! They even have options for my kiddo with Celiac's..

name: suzi Todd

text: The prices are insane and the pizza is roughly on par with Totinos.

Very expensive based on just average menu
Pizza 1 to 5 = 3 Spaget = 3. Service = 3

text: Recently my wife and I visited for the first time in 2 years and we were not happy. I ordered the same food I always do and they not only changed the recipe they changed the price. I got 25% of the food I used to for 10% more. When we ‚Ä¶More

text: This restaurant is trying to hard to cater to Everyone. In doing so they lose the ability to satisfy Anyone.

name: L V

name: maria ortiz
text: One time was one too many. We ordered "the works" but it didn't have any cheese that we could see or taste and the toppings were scattered (thrown) very unevenly on a crust that was so thin it was very difficult to handle it without it tearing and falling apart. Will not be back. We were dissatisfied with the staff as well

name: girlx031
text: Worst CPK I have ever been to. I ordered two kids cheese pizza and they loteraaly went into the trash. My kids wouldn't touch them so I boxed them and took them home. I tried 1 bite at home.. trash. I've never been disappointed from CPK. ‚Ä¶More

text: CPK food was fabulous as always. Service wasn't great. Had to wait twenty minutes before being seated even with many empty tables in plain view. Spent most of the meal with empty water glasses.

name: Andrea Fife
text: My son loves his cheese pizza and brownie.

text: Bad service and took forever to bring 1 pizza of kids menu.

text: Terrible service. Heard the manager talking to our server before we were seated and he was irritated about not being "cut early". We were basically rushed out, not even being asked if we were ready before our checks were brought and were told to have a good night.

name: Star Glismann
text: Great location, friendly service but just too expensive. Popular though.

name: Lisa Nickens
text: I'm from Texas and this one is just as nice as the ones in Tx. It was the 2nd time I had been to this SLC restaurant. The drinks are pricey and just so-so here. The food was great, though. It's located in a nice little shopping center. Don't get lost in the parking garage!

name: Wade Fowler
text: Good pizza before the movie.

name: Maria Mullen
text: Nice people and food was good. The locations is small and a little run down

text: Good food and the bartender was great....

name: Brian - 182

name: Tricia Mcgarvey

name: David Lewis IV
text: Went here for veterans day and had an amazing experience thanks to Cassie our waitress! She was amazing and made the whole visit awesome! Will definitely be back! Plus CPK gave a free entree for veteran's which also I much appreciated and will bring my business back.

name: Belia Paz
text:
Excellent service..
Great pizza, potatoe soup and chicken soup is very good.
I recommend it 100%

name: Jennifer Luther

name: Marianna Martin
text: Three times I have been there, they were always short staffed. Food is okay but seems to be overpriced for the value. Have gluten free options.

text: Meh... This specific location has really gone down hill. The hostess was the only positive. We sat and waited for a server for 25 minutes before leaving. And it was not even busy.

text: I ordered the newer Kung Pao spaghetti. It was pretty good, but very pricey for spaghetti. Also the plate thing it came in was over a foot wide but the actual meal part was maybe only 5-6 inches, thus being very small in general. I like the food here but I never can really justify eating here except for rare occasions.

text: Nothing inspiring about the food. We have eaten California pizza kitchen elsewhere and find it OK, but this one is the worst we've tried. Long wait, some items overly dry, and some essential toppings are out. Would not recommend if you have any alternative options.
